FacebookAd.StylePalette: Warm energizing tones like amber and burnt orange combined with natural browns and soft neutrals; balanced with deep chocolate and charcoal accents.
FacebookAd.StyleCues: Dynamic lifestyle shots in real environments, focusing on a busy professional in an office during a high-stakes meeting with laptop and notes; warm energetic lighting highlights focused facial expressions and quick chew snack; close-up on hand holding Dynamind IQ soft chew and open, pocket-ready package on desk; authentic moment showcasing sustained mental energy and multitasking.
FacebookAd.StyleNotes: Highlights product performance in action for busy professionals requiring sustained cognitive energy; vibrant integration with sophisticated yet approachable tone.
